channel.title: First Look At Steam Running On A Mac
channel.description:
[url]https://kotaku.com/5521625/your-first-look-at-steam-running-on-a-mac[/url] :slight_smile:
Finally, we, mac owners will be able to game properly on them.
[u]If some admin reads this, please eliminate this thread. It seems the other thread created before this one doesn't include the word "mac" in it's title, that's why when I searched for "Steam Mac" I didn't find anything. Sorry, won't happen again[/u]

item.title: First Look At Steam Running On A Mac
item.dc:creator: JohnWorfin
item.description:
Someonerandm:

Will Source SDK be ported?

From now on, the sdk and every source game, even the old ones will run natively in a steam client for both microshaft and crapple. All new valve games will be released simultaneously for OSX, windows and the sex box. There is a linux client on the way.

Read full topic
item.source: First Look At Steam Running On A Mac

item.title: First Look At Steam Running On A Mac
item.dc:creator: Someonerandm
item.description:
Of course I have a terrible graphics card so I’m just hoping I can barely scrape by. BTW, will Source SDK be ported?

Read full topic
item.source: First Look At Steam Running On A Mac

item.title: First Look At Steam Running On A Mac
item.dc:creator: garrthbarrttinn
item.description:
James.Curse:

https://kotaku.com/5521625/your-first-look-at-steam-running-on-a-mac

Finally, we, mac owners will be able to game properly on them.

If some admin reads this, please eliminate this thread. It seems the other thread created before this one doesn’t include the word “mac” in it’s title, that’s why when I searched for “Steam Mac” I didn’t find anything. Sorry, won’t happen again

Mac owners, game properly???
You make me lol.

Read full topic
item.source: First Look At Steam Running On A Mac

item.title: First Look At Steam Running On A Mac
item.dc:creator: James.Curse
item.description:
Maxey:

Valve is providing the platform but it’s up to the game companies to port the games.

Yeah, apart from valve games that will be ported by them. This includes Portal, Half-Life 2 and its episodes, Team Fortress 2 and Left 4 dead.

Read full topic
item.source: First Look At Steam Running On A Mac
